00027 struct sensorInfo {
00028         uint nb_matrices; // number of sensor matrices
00029         uint nb_cells; // total number of sensor cells
00030         uint generated_by; // Firmware revision used to set up the sensor configuration
00031         uint hw_revision; // Revision number of the measurement transducer
00032         uint serial_no; // Serial number of the distributed measurement transducer
00033         uint converter_resolution;
00034 };
00035 
00036 
00038 struct matrixInfo {
00039         UInt8 uid[6]; // Unique 48-bit value that identifies the matrix
00040         uint hw_revision; // Revision number (xx.xx) of the measurement transducer
00041         uint cells_x; // Number of horizontal texels
00042         uint cells_y; // Number of vertical texels
00043         float texel_width; // Width of one texel in millimeters
00044         float texel_height; // Width of one texel in millimeters
00045         float matrix_center_x; // X-coordinate of the matrix center (in mm)
00046         float matrix_center_y; // Y-coordinate of the matrix center (in mm)
00047         float matrix_center_z; // Z-coordinate of the matrix center (in mm)
00048         float matrix_theta_x; // Rotation of matrix about x-axis (in degrees)
00049         float matrix_theta_y; // Rotation of matrix about y-axis (in degrees)
00050         float matrix_theta_z; // Rotation of matrix about z-axis (in degrees)
00051         float fullscale; // Fullscale value of the output signal. For 12-Bit converters: 4095
00052         std::vector<bool> static_mask; // Factory set and not editable
00053         std::vector<bool> dynamic_mask; // Selected texel of interest for faster sampling
00054         uint num_cells; // cells_x * cells_y
00055         uint texel_offset; // Offset to the first texel of each matrix in the entire frame
00056 };
00057 
00058 
00060 struct TSFrame {
00061         std::vector<float> cells;
00062         uint64_t timestamp;
00063         TSFrame() {}
00064         TSFrame(uint nb_cells) : cells(nb_cells) {}
00065 };
00066

00069 struct TemperatureFrame {
00070         std::vector<double> values;
00071         uint64_t timestamp;
00072 };
00073 
00074 
00076 struct JointAngleFrame {
00077         std::vector<double> angles;
00078         uint64_t timestamp;
00079 };

00081 
00083 template <typename Frame>
00084 struct TimestampComparator {
00085         bool operator()(const Frame& frame1, const Frame& frame2) const {
00086                 return frame1.timestamp < frame2.timestamp;
00087         }
00088         bool operator()(const Frame& frame, uint64_t timestamp) const {
00089                 return frame.timestamp < timestamp;
00090         }
00091         bool operator()(uint64_t timestamp, const Frame& frame) const {
00092                 return timestamp < frame.timestamp;
00093         }
00094 };

00539 
00547         inline void convertCellIndex(uint cellID, uint& m, uint& x, uint& y) {
00548                 // Find corresponding matrix
00549                 for(m = 0; m < getNumMatrices(); m++) {
00550                         if(cellID < m_matrices[m].texel_offset ) {
00551                                 break;
00552                         }
00553                 }
00554                 m--;
00555                 uint cellID_matrix = cellID - m_matrices[m].texel_offset;
00556                 x = cellID_matrix % m_matrices[m].cells_x;
00557                 y = cellID_matrix / m_matrices[m].cells_x;
00558         }
00559 
00560 
00567         inline uint convertCellIndex(uint m, uint x, uint y) {
00568                 return m_matrices[m].texel_offset + y * m_matrices[m].cells_x + x;
00569         }
